full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BZANG PO SPYOD PA'I SMON LAM GYI 'CHI BSLU BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (SOGS KYIS SMONLAM DANG, BKRA SHIS KYIS BRGYAN PAR BYA, BZANG PO SPYOD PA'I 'CHI BSLU @006A 'DI BYED LUGS KYANG MI 'DRA BA SNA TSOGS 'DUG KYANG, BLA MA MCHOD PA'I 'BREL BA'I 'DI NI RJE BTZUN DAM PA DZNY'A NA BADZRA GYIS SLOB MA THA SHAL BKA' BCU BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS KYIS BGYIS PA 'DI LA NONGS PA'I TSOGS MCHIS NA MKHAS PA RNAMS KYIS BZOD PAR GSOL, ,DGE'O, ,)
